overview:
As President and CEO, Entertainment, Kevin Baxley is directly responsible for the Concert Touring, Film & TV, Special Events and Theatrical markets globally; the Dallas R&D and Services operations; R&D for Stage CommandÂ® Systems; Product and Asset Management functions; the Los Angeles, New Jersey, Mount Vernon and New Windsor and Tokyo depots; and opportunities emerging in Mexico, Central and South American markets.

Kevin joined PRG in 1988 as CFO and has served in several financial and operational roles prior to his current appointment. He was instrumental in developing the Asset Management and Product Management functions as well as acquisitions, integrations and many programs designed to improve operational efficiencies.
